articles.title: Unseeded Opelka upsets Tsitsipas to earn spot in National Bank Open final - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: American Reilly Opelka is through to the finals at the National Bank Open in Toronto after upsetting Stefanos Tsitsipas of Greece 6(2)-7, 7-6(4), 6-4 on Saturday.
articles.content:
Persistent pressure was the key for Reilly Opelka at the National Bank Open in Toronto on Saturday.
The unseeded American outlasted No. 3 seed Stefanos Tsitsipas of Greece through a marathon two-hou… [+5139 chars]

articles.title: Taliban take key city close to Kabul as US troops arrive to assist evacuations - CNA
articles.description:
KABUL: The Taliban pushed closer to Kabul on Saturday (Aug 14), capturing a key city near Afghanistan's capital as American troops flew in to help evacuate embassy personnel and other civilians.

Continuing a rapid advance, the insurgents took Pul-e-Alam, a…
articles.content:
United Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres warned that "Afghanistan is spinning out of control" and urged all parties to do more to protect civilians.
